reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel after 2 nights of camping at the PA Grand Canyon. The showers and bathroom were very clean and the bed was cozy.
reviews.title: Pleasant Stay

reviews.text: The only downside was the jacuzzi downstairs was too hot--But, we did call the front desk and they responded immediately to correct the temperature.
reviews.title: Great stay in Williamsport
Hampton Inn
reviews.text: The breakfast was good, but not too much of a selection. The only hot item was a bagel with cheese and meat melted on it--Interesting, but not for me.
Overall, it is a nice hotel. It is clean and in a convenient location. Perkins is basically in the same lot and Wegmans right next door(Open 24 hours which was nice for a late snack).
reviews.title: Great Williamsport Experience

likes.liked: — Location and overall quality of accomodations
likes.disliked: — Indoor pool is unbearably hot & humid

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed 1 night at Hampton Inn. Lovely large room and very clean. Room equipped with fridge and microwave. Breakfast offered a large selection of items and the dining room was kept very clean and tidy.
reviews.title: Tops!

reviews.text: First off the room was huge, and the bed was so comfy. We had a king sized bed and a pull-out sofa. The bathroom was also spacious and super clean. The showerhead was fixed really high on the wall, though, so unless you're 5'8" or over, you probably won't be able to reach it to change the settings.
reviews.title: Really Nice.

reviews.text: The buffet breakfast offered lots of choices and the biscuits were out of this world. There were two computers in the lobby with internet for guests to use. The staff was very friendly.
reviews.title: Ideal stop on a road trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only downside was that our floor smelled stale, or maybe smoky, but it didn't seem so bad inside the room. Maybe it was just a "hotel smell."
reviews.title: Clean, quiet, comfortable, great location!

likes.liked: — four things: clean, comfortable, quiet, location

reviews.title: An Excellent Hampton
reviews.text: My wife, 3 month old son and I stayed at the Hampton Inn enroute to a family vacation in NC.

reviews.title: Great Employees
reviews.text: After a long drive we were hoping to get a good nights rest before the next leg and thats exactly what we got. The hotel had placed a crib in our room already and we couldnt have asked for anything more.

I like Hamptons, but this one was especially nice. Very clean, comfortable, and quiet. I enjoyed the hight speed internet, ample free breakfast, and the pleasant and helpful staff. Will definitely stay here again when traveling through the area.
reviews.title: One Night on Business

reviews.text: While on vacation travel with my wife and teenagers, I needed unscheduled overnight lodging and happened upon this Hampton Inn. The front desk was exceedingly helpful and pleasant (despite the late hour), and the room was absolutely superb! While my stay was too brief for me to comment upon the amenities, I can tell you that the facility was flawless and the service perfect.
reviews.title: A+ lodging
Not one complaint!
reviews.text: I am also a very picky customer, and this hotel pleased in every way! The staff were extremely friendly and helpful, from the moment we checked in until they were waving and saying goodbye to the kids as we departed.

The facilities were clean, the pool is large, the breakfast buffet extremely generous, and the rooms well-equipped with such nice extras as linens for the port-a-crib. My husband likes the wireless internet access as well.
reviews.title: Our second home - new, clean, convenient!
